name: ShittySpaceGame (WARNING: do not eat!)
description:
Shoot asteroids. You can not shoot the steel asteroids since they dont exist in reality. Thats why they are indestructable. Because an idea is indestructable. Game Logic.

Oh yeah, you ran out of fuel and have to use the recoil of your weapon system.

Two Items will spawn at a time, but they will disapperar together once you have collecte one. Try to wait before you collect, so you can combine two items. Or don't. I don't really care This game is really bad btw

If the items don't work open the main menue, it should work afterwards. Im working on a fix
